name: Tekhero VS Code
description:
This game is a 3D FPS made  in 48 hours for the occasion of the Epitech JAM.

You are the last developer in a world full of bugs (but it's spider ^^) that will attack you.

You have to defend yourself using a shotgun and a sniper. Once you killed at least 35 bugs, you can try to kill the boss.

Good luck!
